reviews.content: While Underwood's performance leaves much to be desired, the musical numbers were fantastic, and the rest of the cast more than helps to carry her to the end. A good effort, but I would like to see them try this again.
Funny, original, & full of singing/ dancing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

3 to 3 and a half. The Sound Of Music Live! Doesnt reach the heights of the original the whole way through and doesnt have the epicness of it all the way through but its still feel good viewing and does have alittle adventure like the original, just shortned. It falls short a bit but they worked hard on this and it is not bad.
